girls.title: Girls Poses
girls.description: Discover elegant and stylish poses for girls

saree-poses.title: Saree Poses
saree-poses.description: Traditional and modern poses perfect for saree photography

poses.title: Classic Saree Drape
poses.alt: Woman in elegant saree posing with classic drape, one hand on hip, gentle smile
steps: Stand straight with your feet slightly apart
Drape the saree pallu elegantly over your shoulder
Place one hand gently on your hip
Turn your body slightly to create a flattering angle
Look directly at the camera with a soft smile

bodyLanguage.posture: Keep your back straight and shoulders relaxed
bodyLanguage.hands: One hand on hip creates a natural curve, other hand can hold the pallu
bodyLanguage.angle: Slight 45-degree turn to the camera is most flattering

poses.title: Walking Saree Pose
poses.alt: Woman in colorful saree walking gracefully, saree flowing in motion
steps: Let the saree flow naturally behind you
Keep your arms relaxed and natural

bodyLanguage.posture: Lean slightly forward to show movement
bodyLanguage.hands: Arms should swing naturally with the walk
bodyLanguage.expression: Gentle smile or looking away creates elegance
bodyLanguage.angle: Side profile with slight turn of head

poses.title: Sitting Saree Pose
poses.alt: Woman in saree sitting gracefully on steps, saree arranged beautifully around her
steps: Sit on a step or low surface
Arrange the saree pleats neatly around you
Place hands on your knees or lap
Look at the camera with a serene expression

bodyLanguage.hands: Rest hands naturally on knees or hold the pallu
bodyLanguage.angle: Face camera directly or slight angle

streetwear.title: Streetwear Poses
streetwear.description: Urban and trendy poses for street fashion photography

poses.title: Casual Street Stance
poses.alt: Girl in streetwear standing casually against urban backdrop, confident pose
steps: Hands in pockets or one hand on hip
Lean slightly against a wall or backdrop
Look directly at camera with confident expression

bodyLanguage.hands: Hands in pockets or one hand on hip

poses.title: Walking Street Pose
poses.alt: Girl in trendy streetwear walking confidently down urban street
steps: Look straight ahead or slightly to the side
Let your outfit flow with movement

bodyLanguage.hands: Natural arm swing or hands in pockets

poses.title: Natural Smile Pose
poses.alt: Girl with natural smile, casual outfit, relaxed pose
steps: Keep hands at your sides or one hand on hip
Think of something happy for natural expression

boys.title: Boys Poses
boys.description: Stylish and confident poses for boys

casual.title: Casual Poses
casual.description: Relaxed and natural poses for everyday photography

poses.title: Confident Stand
poses.alt: Young man standing confidently, casual outfit, hands in pockets
steps: Place hands in pockets or one hand on hip

bodyLanguage.hands: Hands in pockets or one hand on hip

poses.title: Leaning Pose
poses.alt: Young man leaning against wall, casual pose, relaxed expression
steps: Find a wall or surface to lean against
Cross arms or place one hand in pocket
Look at camera with relaxed expression

bodyLanguage.hands: Crossed arms or one hand in pocket
bodyLanguage.angle: Side angle with head turn to camera

formal.title: Formal Poses
formal.description: Professional and elegant poses for formal occasions

poses.title: Professional Stand
poses.alt: Young man in formal attire standing professionally, confident posture
steps: Stand straight with feet together or slightly apart
Keep hands at sides or one hand in pocket

bodyLanguage.hands: At sides or one hand in pocket

couples.title: Couples Poses
couples.description: Romantic and fun poses for couples photography

romantic.title: Romantic Poses
romantic.description: Intimate and romantic poses for couples

poses.title: Forehead Touch
poses.alt: Couple touching foreheads, intimate romantic pose, gentle smiles
steps: Close your eyes or look into each other's eyes
Place hands on each other's arms or waist

bodyLanguage.hands: Gentle touch on arms, waist, or face

poses.title: Walking Together
poses.alt: Couple walking hand in hand, romantic sunset backdrop
steps: Look at each other or ahead

bodyLanguage.angle: Side or back view shows connection

fun.title: Fun Poses
fun.description: Playful and energetic poses for couples

poses.title: Jumping Together
poses.alt: Couple jumping together in the air, joyful expressions, fun pose
steps: Hold hands or stand close together
